description: Support to Sustainable Transportation System in the City of Belgrade

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: The main objective of this PPG funded activities will be the development of an eligible GEF MSP proposal. The expected objective of the MSP project is to reduce GHG emissions from transport in Belgrade through a modal shift to less polluting transportation means.
subproject.title: PIMS 3781 CC PPG ST

title: Support to Sustainable Transport in the City of Belgrade
